items.title: Golden Bear Orientation Aug 21-25
items.html:
• Expect increased undergraduate pedestrian traffic week of Aug 21-25, pending schedule of events that may take place at Memorial Stadium and around Haas.
  • Bowles will be closed and there will be a lot of traffic on Piedmont Ave both ways.

items.title: Fall 2025 Add/Drop
items.html:
• Fall 2025 Round 3 Add/Drop opens on Mon, Aug 25 at 12pm (noon) PT and closes on Fri, Aug 29 at 12pm (noon) PT
  • Fall 2025 Round 4 Add/Drop opens on Fri, Aug 29 4:00pm PT and closes on Wed, Sep 3 at 12pm (noon) PT
  • Drop Only opens on Thu, Sep 3 at 4:00pm PT and closes on Mon, Sep 8 at 11:59pm PT. This is your last opportunity to drop yourself from a course.

items.title: Full Time MBA Course Request Info
items.html:
• Interested in a Full-Time MBA course? See the FTMBA courses and the Full-Time Elective Sign-Up Guide to participate in the enrollment process.
  • Full Time MBA Signup Deadline:
    • Sign-up opens: Monday, Aug 25 at 12:00 PM PT
    • Sign-up closes: Thursday, Sept 4 at 11:59 PM PT
    • Results available Friday, Sept 5
    • Drop deadline: Monday, Sept 8 at 11:59 PM PT

items.title: Full Time MBA Signup Deadlines
items.html:
• Sign up open Monday Aug 25, 12PM PT.
  • Sign up closes Thursday Sept 4, 11:59PM PT (results available Friday Sep 5)
  • Full-Time course drop deadline Monday Sep 8, 11:59PM PT.

items.title: AI-Powered PM Crash Course Info Session
items.html:
Thursday, Aug 28; 5-5:45PM, Zoom
  • Professor Vince Law will be hosting an info session about his upcoming course ??EW/MBA290T.13 "AI-Powered PM Crash Course".??
  • This will provide you with an overview of course content as well as the purpose of the course and how it is designed.
  • There will be time for attendees to ask questions as well as provide feedback on how the course can be improved.??

items.title: Upcoming Traffic Advisories
items.html:
Greek Theater Concert on Thursday, Sept 4

  • Pedestrian traffic starts around 4PM. Concert doors open at 5:30PM.??
  • Bowles will be closed and there will be a lot of traffic on Piedmont Ave both ways.
  • Please allow extra time if you really, really, really need to park at Berkeley Law Lot.
    • Underhill is recommended

items.title: Fall Electives Begin
items.html:
• Elective classes are starting on Saturday, Aug 23
  • Some classes may have a unique schedule so double check the course descriptions linked on the Elective Schedule.
  • Please double check OLR to see what you are enrolled in and what waitlists you may be on.
  • If you are on the waitlist for a class you should still attend so that you do not miss any content while you wait.

items.title: Caf?? Think Is Closed
items.html:
• A new vendor is coming soon, but there will be a short gap in service.
  • The Program Office encourages students who are looking for dining options near Haas to consider the following:??
    • Edmonds Cafe: Open until 7PM on Mondays, Tuesdays, and Saturdays, and open until 9PM on Wednesday's and Thursday's.
    • Caff????Strada: Closes at midnight daily

items.title: Parking & Transportation - Greek Theater Concert
items.html:
• Pedestrian traffic starts around 5PM. Concert doors open at 6:30PM.
  • Bowles will be closed and there will be a lot of traffic on Piedmont Ave both ways.
  • Please allow extra time if you really, really, really need to park at Berkeley Law Lot. Underhill is recommended.
Lunch Etiquette??
  • Lunch will be served in Bank of America Forum (next to the MBA Lounge) until further notice.
  • As a gentle reminder, the Program Office??asks that students wear their namebadge??during the Saturday lunch service.
    • With the limited number of meals that are available, this system will help the catering staff easily identify students that should be receiving food
    • Catering staff has been instructed to not serve food to students not wearing their name badge
    • Your nameplate is also an acceptable form of verification for the catering staff
  • Thank you for your cooperation & understanding!
Program Office Staff??
  • This week's Program Office Staff will be Olivia Coffman and Hannah Fischer.
  • Drop by S440 and say hello!

items.title: Save the Date for the EWMBA Football Tailgate!
items.html:
Saturday, September 13, 2025; Cal Vs Minnesota
  • The??Tailgate??in the Haas Courtyard will take place from 5:30PM - 7:30PM before a 7:30PM kick off.
    • Tailgate??is FREE to attend but registration is required??
    • Discounted tickets ($15) for EWMBA students to attend the game
    • Please note that no plus ones are allowed for this event
  • Tailgate??registration and game tickets are available via CampusGroups.
    • The physical tickets will be distributed week of the event

items.title: Berkeley Haas Entrepreneurship Program Open House
items.html:
Monday, Aug 25, 6 - 8:00PM PST,??Spieker Forum, Haas School of Business
  • Learn more about the various programs available at Haas that can help jumpstart your entrepreneurial journey!
    • Light food & refreshments will also be provided
  • Registration for the Berkeley Haas Entrepreneurship Program Open House??is now open.??
    • On-site registration will be available at the event on a first-come, first-served basis, subject to space availability

items.title: UC LAUNCH Startup Accelerator Information Session
items.html:
In Person: Tuesday, Aug 26, 4 - 5:00PM PST,??N500,??Chou Hall
Virtual: Wednesday, Sept 3, 5-6:00PM PST Zoom
  • Join the information session to learn about UC LAUNCH startup accelerator??and how to apply!
    • The deadline to apply for UC Launch is Friday, Sept 5 at 11:59PM PST
  • Registration for the UC Launch In Person & Virtual Info Sessions are now open
    • Please note for the Virtual Session that the Zoom link and calendar invite will be shared with you upon registration????

items.title: Center for Social Sector Leadership Ice-Cream Social
items.html:
Tuesday, Aug 26, 4:30 - 6:00PM PST,??Wells Fargo Room, Haas School of Business
  • Join the Center for Social Sector Leadership (CSSL) for an Ice-Cream Social event!
    • This is a great opportunity to learn about the various programs, courses and networking opportunities CSSL has to offer
  • Registration for the CSSL Ice-Cream Social??is now open.??

items.title: Berkeley Board Fellows Virtual Info Session
items.html:
Thursday, Aug 28, 4:30 - 5:30PM PST
  • This info session is an opportunity to learn more about the Berkeley Board Fellows Program.
  • As a Berkeley Board Fellow, you will spend a year on the board of a Bay Area nonprofit??where you will:
    • Gain hands-on experience nonprofit governance
    • Sharpen your leadership skills
    • Drive social change
  • Registration for the??Berkeley Board Fellows Virtual Info Session??is now open.??
    • The Zoom link for this session will be shared at a future date

items.title: Enter Your CalCentral Emergency Contact Information
items.html: • While we always hope for the best, the Program Office recommends all students also update the Emergency Contact section in CalCentral > Profile > Emergency Contact.
